activities: We are a business-to-business consulting company that may receive data for supporting purposes. We neither collect nor transfer the data from/to any party and do not expose the data. We use best practices to ensure that access to the data is restricted to our employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data processed that is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework is business-to-business oriented clients and customers. The data covered includes manually processed data.
